contents.text: Thank you for calling Wollborg Michelson Recruiting in San Francisco, where every company finds its dream candidate and every person discovers their dream job.
If you are an employer seeking to fill positions with your dream candidate, press 1.
To speak with one of our recruiting specialists, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a recruiting specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to connect with a recruiter to help me fill an open position at my company.
I’d like to speak with a recruiting specialist about hiring veterans at my company.
Discuss integration of an API-driven talent acquisition pipeline to source software engineers on a tight deadline
I need to speak with a recruiter about filling a position at my company.
Connect me to a recruiting specialist to discuss internship and entry-level physics roles.

contents.text: For details on our service packages and pricing, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve information on our service packages and pricing.

navigationGoals: I’d like to get information on your service plans and pricing for hiring support.
I need information on your service packages and pricing for veteran recruitment.
Get a detailed breakdown of service tiers and enterprise pricing for volume candidate sourcing and ATS optimization
I’d like information on your recruiting service plans and their pricing.
Get pricing details for resume review and interview coaching services.

contents.text: If you are a candidate looking for your dream job, press 2.
To submit your resume and explore open roles, press 1.
Please hold while we guide you to our candidate portal.

navigationGoals: I want to submit my resume and look through current job opportunities.
I want to submit my resume and explore open roles that match my skills.
Upload my resume to the candidate portal and search backend engineer openings filtered by Go and Kubernetes experience
I want to submit my resume and explore available job openings.
Submit my CV and explore current physics research job openings.

contents.text: To schedule a career consultation, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a career consultant.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a session with a career consultant.
I’d like to schedule a career consultation to plan my transition to a civilian job.
Schedule a technical career consultation to optimize my LinkedIn profile and prep for algorithmic coding interviews
I’d like to schedule a career consultation to discuss my job search.
Schedule a career consultation to refine my CV and discuss job search strategies.
